# Simple Tool

A minimal valid document with only required elements.

## Installation

Install using go:

```bash
go install github.com/example/simple-tool
```

## Usage

Basic usage:

```go
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello from simple tool")
}
```

Another example:

```go
package examples

func ExampleUsage() {
    // Do something useful
}
```
